    public abstract class MSMOTController
extends MSTController

    • Nested Class Summary

      class  MSMOTController.VirtualTC
      Class for representing an output/control-loop as its own temperature controller.

      void waitForStableTemperature(int output)
      Waits for the temperature reported by the sensor used by the specified output/control-loop to remain within 1% of its target (set-point) temperature for at least 1 minute.
